  • Constructor Details

    • ItemManager

      public ItemManager()

  • Method Details

    • generateId

      public int generateId()
      Generates a unique ID for an item. Each item added to the stock will be assigned a unique ID.
      Returns:
      A unique item ID.

    • addStock

      public void addStock(Item item)
      Adds an item to the stock. If an item with the same name already exists in the stock, it updates the quantity of that item; otherwise, it generates a new ID for the item and adds it to the stock.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add or update in the stock.

    • searchByName

      public Item searchByName(String name)
      Searches for an item in the stock by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      The found item or null if the item is not in the stock.

    • searchByID

      public Item searchByID(int itemId)
      Searches for an item in the stock by its ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      The found item or null if the item is not in the stock.

    • viewInventory

      public void viewInventory()
      Displays the inventory of all items in the stock.

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice(int itemId, int newPrice)
      Updates the price of an item in the stock.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to update.
      newPrice - The new price of the item.

    • updateQty

      public void updateQty(int itemId, double newQuantity)
      Updates the quantity of an item in the stock.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to update.
      newQuantity - The new quantity of the item.

    • increment

      public void increment(int itemId, double amount)
      Increments the quantity of an item in the stock.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to increment.
      amount - The quantity to increment by.

    • decrement

      public void decrement(int itemId, double amount)
      Decrements the quantity of an item in the stock. If the resulting quantity would be negative, it prevents the decrement and displays an error message.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to decrement.
      amount - The quantity to decrement by.
